name: Flamberge.
desc: Attack with Ignis. Effective vs Lykons, Wolves.

name: Light Brand
desc: Attack with Solus. Eff vs Daemons, Nephyliae.

name: Wind Edge
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Effective against fliers.
icon_nid: {Tactics Ogre LUCT, EldritchAbo, serebii01} Item Icon Sheet 1

name: Blood Edge
desc: Uses MAG to determine damage. Drains HP from enemy
icon_nid: {Tactics Ogre LUCT, EldritchAbo, serebii01} Item Icon Sheet 1

name: Shamshir
icon_nid: {Tactics Ogre LUCT, EldritchAbo, serebii01} Item Icon Sheet 1

name: Almace
desc:
+5 Str/Mag. Miriam only.
Effective vs Lykons, Dragons.

name: Joyeuse
desc:
A prized weapon of House Lyudam. Amaya only.
Contains Light Magic.

name: Galatine
desc:
Kitezh sacred treasure. Int+10.
Lake Lady only. Eff vs Dragons, Horses.

name: Armorslayer
desc: Inflicts Armor Break on units wearing armor if at least 1 damage is dealt.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Siegmund
desc: Ephraim only. Strength +5. Effective against monsters.

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters

name: Heal Staff
desc: Healing Range + 1, grants "Healing Water" when equipped.

name: Mend
desc: Healing Range + 1, grants "Life Energy" when equipped.

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: target.wexp['Light'] or target.wexp['Anima'] or target.wexp['Dark'] or target.wexp['Staff']

name: Telekinesis
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Airyukin
desc: Summons a dragon of light to smite evil.

name: Holy Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Blessing of Sylvan
desc: Call upon the blessing of Sylvan. Heals all allies on map once per chapter.

name: Enflame
desc: Ally deals fire elemental damage for 2 turns.

name: Fire Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Lightbing Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: HealingRain
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Purifying Breath
desc: Breath magic. Heals allies and restores condition. Dragons only.

name: Freeze
desc: Enemy cannot move or attack for 2 turns. Frozen enemies receive critical damage if struck.

name: Time Stop
desc:
Freezes all units in place for one turn and stops the turn counter except for the wielder.
Certain units may be immune.

name: Frost Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Ultima
desc:
Technique perfected by Dalton. Combines Ventus,
Fulgus, and Aquis to form a massive tempest.

name: Tempest Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Reforge
desc: Restores ally's equipped weapon to full uses.

name: Petrify
desc: Encases target in stone for 2 turns. All Avd reduced to 0, but damage is greatly reduced.

name: Stone Wall
desc: Unit cannot move, but is immune to all physical damage for 1 turn.

name: Corrosive Breath
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Transfusion
desc: Restores an ally's HP from user's own HP, max: user's HP - 1.

name: Leech
desc:
Dark magic. Eff vs Benoa, Holy.
User recovers HP equal to damage dealt.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Breath magic. Ignore's enemy defence. Dragons only.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Orocule
desc:
A special runic device granting long-distance communication.
Spell Range + 2 when equipped. Lords only.

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Fili Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: Magic
desc: Cast a spell from your personal spell list.
